text: Hagi zamagra ana vahe'mo'za vahekura zamasunku huozamante vaheki'za, zamazampina atine karugru kevenena eri'naze. Ana hune'za zamagra hosi afu agumpi manine'za ne-esageno zamagasasamo'a hagerimo rupokra neseno hiankna agasasa rugahie. Hagi Babiloni vahemota tamagri hara eme huramante'naku avazuhumpi hu'za egahaze.
